Articles.Content:
Hey there!!

I just got this idea which I think would be a cool addition to the game.

The idea is to add a testing facility building in which you can test rovers or landers, which would cost no money (since it's like a theoretical facility). With such a facility in place the revert option can now be deleted (or at least hidden) so it urges you to test your lander, rover or whatever first. This would make the whole thing quite a bit more realistic.

If you think this is a nice idea also or have any supplements please post a reply! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
